Las Cepas Hotel de Cata & Relax
8.9 Excellent
Based on 36 reviews

The staff at Las Cepas Hotel de Cata & Relax were very friendly and helpful from the moment I arrived.

The hotel is very stylish, modern and comfortable. Plus it's located close enough t9o all the attractions, but not so close to disturb a restful, relaxing stay.

Hotel Pulitzer Buenos Aires
8.5 Excellent
Based on 44 reviews

Staff were brilliant with assisting my friend and I with any queries/enquires. The hotel was in a great location.

The only downside, if any, relates to the coffee at breakfast. The buffet breakfast was brilliant and varied but I didn't understand why coffee and tea had to be kept behind the desk and distributed by only one person. It was clear everyone at breakfast wanted a hot drink and it felt like it was 'rationed' which was unexpected in such a well rated and catered hotel. I'd still happily stay here again and recommend it to my friends and family.

HTL 9 de Julio BsAs
8.7 Excellent
Based on 41 reviews

really friendly and helpful staff. room that we got however was in the centre of the building and had 6 airconditers for what seemed like all of the surrounding apartments! as a result it was pretty noisey.

other sore point was that the kithen was completely void of anything useful. no wine glasses.. no mugs.. no plates... no cutlery. as a result couldn't really eat or drink anything, nor even have a cup of tea! all of that said, the room was relatively spacious and comfortable, and as i said, staff were super-friendly and accomodating. checkout was 12pm which was great!

Soltigua Apart Hotel Mendoza

Duque Hotel Boutique & Spa
9.1 Exceptional
Based on 27 reviews

I love this hotel. I only stayed for two days but I wish I felt the stay was worth it. I felt very safe in the area (being a 19 year old female alone, this was important) and felt no fear of pickpockets like so many warned me of.

I highly recommend this place, however, I would also recommend staying elsewhere in BA after or before staying here. Recoleta is the main tourist area to stay and was where I spent the remainder of my trip

Arribo Buenos Aires Hotel Boutique
8.7 Excellent
Based on 32 reviews

This hotel is small but is extremely comfortable and very personal. The staff are available 24/7 to assist you and offer recommendations.

There is a great rooftop terrace where you can relax after a full day of sightseeing. The building is completely remodeled and has the comfort of home. I would highly recommend this hotel! Excellent buffet breakfast, wifi, and cable t.v.

Find the Perfect Type of Accommodation

More about Argentina

Argentina has long been on the list of top destinations to visit in South America. Agoda.com offers the best prices for hotels in Argentina, with 11229 hotels ready for instant reservation via our secure online booking engine. We have every main region covered, including Buenos Aires, Cordoba, Santa Cruz, with lots of promotions such as early bird offers and last minute deals. While any city is sure to excite, Buenos Aires, Puerto Iguazu, El Calafate go above and beyond to capture your attention. Sweet deals are just a click away when you use Agoda.com to book your next trip to Argentina.

I felt very safe in the area (being a 19 year old female alone, this was important) and felt no fear of pickpockets like so many warned me of. I highly recommend this place, however, I would also recommend staying elsewhere in BA after or before staying here. Recoleta is the main tourist area to stay and was where I spent the remainder of my trip Show more Olivia , United States Panamericano Buenos Aires 8.4 Excellent Based on 12 reviews Dream Studios BA Apartments 8.5 Excellent Based on 11 reviews Tremun Calafate Parque Hotel 9.3 Exceptional Based on 3 reviews Hotel Presidente Buenos Aires 8.3 Excellent Based on 14 reviews Hotel Cottbus 8.7 Excellent Based on 1175 reviews Arribo Buenos Aires Hotel Boutique 8.7 Excellent Based on 32 reviews This hotel is small but is extremely comfortable and very personal. The staff are available 24/7 to assist you and offer recommendations. There is a great rooftop terrace where you can relax after a full day of sightseeing. The building is completely remodeled and has the comfort of home. I would highly recommend this hotel! Excellent buffet breakfast, wifi, and cable t.v.
